title: lower_submersible_pump_into_well
summary: Submersible water pump lowered into a well to pump water for farm use.
description: This data unit documents the action of lowering a submersible water pump into an on-site well to pump water for use at MaMeeFarm. The image shows the pump being positioned with hoses and power cable managed at the well opening.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
